en_question:
Factories $A_1$ and $A_2$ produce a certain type of material. Due to high demand and insufficient supply, a new factory needs to be built. There are two construction options: $A_3$ and $A_4$. The material is needed in four locations: $B_1, B_2, B_3, B_4$. The annual production capacities of each factory, the annual demand at each location, and the unit transportation cost of materials from each factory to each demand location $c_{ij}$ (in thousand yuan per kiloton, where i,j = 1,2,3,4) are shown in Table 5-2. 

\begin{table}[h]
    \centering
    \caption{Table 5-2: Unit Transportation Costs from Factories to Demand Locations}
    \renewcommand{\arraystretch}{1.2}
    \begin{tabular}{c|cccc|c}
        \toprule
        $c_{ij}$ (thousand yuan/kt) & $B_1$ & $B_2$ & $B_3$ & $B_4$ & Production Capacity (kt/year) \\
        \midrule
        $A_1$ & 2 & 9 & 3 & 4 & 400 \\
        $A_2$ & 8 & 3 & 5 & 7 & 600 \\
        $A_3$ & 7 & 6 & 1 & 2 & 200 \\
        $A_4$ & 4 & 5 & 2 & 5 & 200 \\
        \midrule
        Demand (kt/year) & 350 & 400 & 300 & 150 & \\
        \bottomrule
    \end{tabular}
\end{table}

If factory $A_3$ is built, its annual production cost is estimated to be 1200 thousand yuan;if $A_4$ is built, the annual production cost is 1500 thousand yuan.The goal is to decide whether to build factory $A_3$ or $A_4$ in order to minimize the total annual cost, which includes all transportation costs and the production cost(in thousand yuan) of the new factory.
cn_question:
厂 $A_1$ 和 $A_2$ 生产某种物资。由于该种物资供不应求，故需要再建一家工厂。相应的建厂方案有 $A_3$ 和 $A_4$ 两个。这种物资的需求地有 $B_1, B_2, B_3, B_4$ 四个。各工厂年生产能力、各地年需求量、各厂至各需求地的单位物资运费 $c_{ij} (i,j=1,2,3,4)$ 见表 5-2。

\begin{table}[h]
    \centering
    \caption{工厂至需求地的单位物资运输费用（表 5-2）}
    \renewcommand{\arraystretch}{1.2}
    \begin{tabular}{c|cccc|c}
        \toprule
        $c_{ij}$ (万元/kt) & $B_1$ & $B_2$ & $B_3$ & $B_4$ & 生产能力 (kt/年) \\
        \midrule
        $A_1$ & 2 & 9 & 3 & 4 & 400 \\
        $A_2$ & 8 & 3 & 5 & 7 & 600 \\
        $A_3$ & 7 & 6 & 1 & 2 & 200 \\
        $A_4$ & 4 & 5 & 2 & 5 & 200 \\
        \midrule
        需求量 (kt/年) & 350 & 400 & 300 & 150 & \\
        \bottomrule
    \end{tabular}
\end{table}

工厂 $A_3$ 或 $A_4$ 开工后，每年的生产费用估计分别为 1200 万元或 1500 万元。现要决定应建设工厂 $A_3$ 还是 $A_4$，才能使每年的总费用（即全部物资运输费和新工厂生产费用之和）最少。
